about_the_game:
Brutal, relentless, hard hitting and heavy, bring on the madness with this new metal music pack from ayato sound create! Featuring speed metal riffs with pounding drums, slick retro synthetic guitars, this riff heavy madness will take your battles over the edge!!!

Features:

* 14 BGM for royalty-free use
* mp3, m4a, wav, ogg, ogg loop formats included
* Music for dungeon battles, boss battle and more!
* For use in RPG Makers and Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice!

Tracklist:

1. Brutal crisis
2. TDBD
3. Breed
4. Blood
5. Pain
6. Deep blue
7. Hardcore
8. SxE
9. Nu metal
10. Metal core
11. Speed attack
12. Truth
13. Stress
14. Long Goodbye
